item.description:
Ronald Gregg, Senior Lecturer and Programming Director of Film Studies at Yale University, introduces the fictionalized retelling — in a series of vignettes — of the life of Michelangelo Merisi da Caravaggio.

 

1986. U.K. 93 min. Not Rated. Directed by Derek Jarman.   Read the Examiner review.  http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0090798/

This event is FREE.  It is one of the special events accompanying the exhibit "Burst of Light: Caravaggio and His Legacy" that opens in March and runs until June 16th.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "Caravaggio" @ The Wadsworth Atheneum
